reviews.review: LOL! AWESOME!!!!!! =D

Absolutely hillarious.  It is familar but at the same time totally fresh with about half a dozen new puzzle elements.  So basically Portal but longer AND more varied.  Replay value isn't the greatest but Co-op is definitely worth a look.  If you see it for 20$ or less and you liked Portal at all then pick this up, no question.  "SCIENCE ISN'T ABOUT WHY!  IT'S ABOUT WHY NOT!"
A great game, highly recommended
Its the best Portal game in the world....you would have to be stupied not to get it when its half off or 75% off....so get it....!

Awesome-Kickass game in both single and co-op modes. Puzzles are clever, sometimes hard, and Glados is as funny as ever.

Overall: 9/10. it suffers a little bit from lenght.

Great followup to the original game.  New features to incorporate in your solutions.  Hard enough that you had to think about some of the solutions, but easy enough that you didn't waste a lot of time on most puzzles
Great puzzle game with amazing story and characters, the scenery and soundtrack is also top notch, highly recommend although you might want to first play Portal to fully know the story.

I learned a valuable lesson about Portal 2. It's an awesome game that you should play.

Are you kidding me Valve? Portal 2 can be summed up in 3 words "This game ripped off starcraft". Glados is protoss, chell the terran, and the tiny robots are basically reskinned zerglings. A wise man once said "Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery"; well I SINCERELY believe Blizzard should be upset at this "game" which really amounts to the original SC N64 port. Do yourself a favor, if you want a fun game involving puzzles and portals, go buy train simulator. F- would not play again.
I only recently played this game as well, it improved for fixed everything from portal 1, a truly perfect puzzle game 10/10 from me.
It's fun

Each second of Portal 2 is enjoyable and unique, unlike anything else, and it offers a superb storyline and amusing dialogue to compliment it.

Portal 2 is the highly anticipated sequal to the smash hit 'Portal'. This First Person Shooter & puzzle game, takes the unique game play experience of Portal and puts a post-apocalyptic spin on it. Playing as the (formely) Aperture test subject 'Chell', Portal 2 immerses the player into a post-apocalyptic storyline that follows on from the prequal.

Utilising the unique gameplay style refined in Portal 1, Portal 2 thrusts players into the future, where the once immaculate rooms and hallways of the Aperture Science Testing Facility now lay dormant and in ruins.

Delve into the mysteries and trials that await deeper within the halways and chambers of the immense and enormous Aperture Science Testing Facility, but beware the surprises that lurk within.

Se Portal 1 já era bom, Valve consegue fazer Portal 2 se tornar outro marco. A complexa história da Aperture e suas ligações com Black Mesa caem no seu colo. O passado angustiante da GLaDOs faz seu cérebro derreter em teorias, enquanto você conhece outros personagens tão geniais quanto a mal humorada robô psicopata. E você sofre em meio à agonia de saber que a Valve tem uma certa alergia ao número 3, o que significa que se já é impossível sonhar com Half Life 2 Episode 3, sonhar com Portal 3, então, é praticamente acreditar que o bolo é de verdade.
E eu preciso de alguém pra fazer a campanha co-op comigo. Caceta! u_u
its good

Portal 2, I must say, is one of the best, most original, most interesting game I have ever played. The storyline is really great and youll like it if you are a fan of robotic and technologic things. It is definitly better than the first Portal, and will suck out many many hours out of your life. Co-op is really fun, and will really encourage teamwork and thinkind together. It will definitly challenge you and your friends brain capacity and will get you to think outside the box at most times. Shooting portals around everywhere can be very fun, and especially with other people. Learning about the different characters throughout the story will definitly be fun and interesting. I definitly recommend Portal and Portal 2 to anyone and especially Portal 2.
Portal 2 - лучшая игра,в которую я когда-либо играл(не считая Half-life 2).Сдесь есть всё : хороший сюжет,интересные головоломки,весёлый кооператив и самая эпичная концовка!
tolles game
Brilliant game, excellent story, challenging co-op. Love this game!
Awsom and epic game, lot's of fun and luagh.

Play this if you're into puzzle games. This game takes puzzles to a whole new level of creativity. The story has been greatly improved from the previous Portal, with new puzzle elements. The puzzles themselves are well designed in a way that you won't be stuck forever; keeping the flow of the story and puzzling sovling at a fair rate. If I say anymore, I may spoil the game, just play this now!
the best intelligent puzzle-based game ive ever played, beautiful, funny, entertaining, and an all around amazing experience
Why are you even reading this? It's more Portal. Get it. Go on. Don't think, just do.
Best game of 2011.
The cake is a lie !!!

the co-op campaign is such a fun experience, you're sure to enjoy it with your friend!

Bombová hra plná hlavolamu, vtipu a zabavy. Delikatesni zaležitost teměř bez chyby až na jednu vše jednou začina a v tomto pripade bohužel i končí :( chci viiiiiiiiiiic map xD 

PS: česká lokalizace je zde kvalitni oproti jinejm hrám.. at nani delal kdokoliv věděl co dělá :)
The best portal-shooting and test-chamber-exploring game you'll play!
And I thought going through just one was badass, now's there 2 whole portals! Take my money valve!

Not much to say. It's Portal. Everyone has heard of Portal, and if you haven't you should have. It is one of the most engaging games I have ever played. Challenging puzzles, Intriguing story line, smooth gameplay; this game has it all. If you were to buy only one game, make it this one.
This is one of my favourite games its a lot of fun has great puzzles and a great story and you can even play it with a friend!

Addictive gameplay, hillarious humor, and a challenging multiplayer makes this game a pure hit. Just make sure you have some friends to play it with after beating the game. But, if you don't, there are also the new community maps that will offer new challenges and experiences.
If you haven't played it... wait, you haven't played it? ARE YOU NUTS?!
Gotta have ! Court mais intense, une expérience inoubliable qu'il faut absolument vivre. Super jeu de plate-formes.
Toujours le même concept superbe, mais avec des nouveautés, le jeu est plus long,  les environnements plus variés, beaucoup d'humour... Bref, encore meilleur !
Ett värdig uppföljare till ett smart spel. Spelet har fantastiska miljöer och pussel som ser till att hjärnan får ett rejält gympapass.
Episches Spiel wofür man Hirn braucht aber sich trotzdem nicht anstrengen muss so sollte es sein.Singleplayer und Coop sind das Geld absolut wert.

A very fun and creative puzzle/fps hybrid. The puzzles are fun to solve and the story and humor makes me want to play more. I can't wait to try out co-op.

First half of the game had me giddy as the story progressed. Second half got a little tired. It started to feel a bit repetitive but it did tell another side to the story about the origins of arpature science.

I would still reccomend this to anyone, one of the best games I've played.

Not entirely as good as the first game, it has merits all its own. Absolutely worth getting.

Wird den Erwartungen gerecht und setzt die Reihe konsequent fort. Die Werbekampange war auch einfach nur mehr als gelungen. Portal hat bei mir zwar irgendwie noch son "erster Teil und ursprünglich nur als "Beilage" gedacht Bonus" aber das Spielprinzip ist das gleiche, der Humor ist der gleiche und es macht einfach Spaß.

Portal was a great game. Take Portal and add lots of more hours of gametime, trickier puzzles, co-op campaign, new features and more story, then you´ll have Portal 2. Awesomeness.

Portal is just awesome, there's few games that had such an impact in game culture and been referenced in so many ways by others as this little game. And that it is sadly. It's a small game worth 8-9 hours of single player gameplay. I enjoyed it that surely, but if I had the choice again I'd only buy it when it's priced down.
Dont play this game. The co-op is BROKEN AS FUCK AND THE CUBES WILL GO IN UNREACHABLE PLACES.
Are you stupid? Pick this up during the holiday sale if you are cheap like me.

Гениальное продолжение гениальной игры. Отличные головоломки, порталы, специфический юмор Гладос, Уитли, картошка... Игра оставляет просто неизгладимые впечатления, одна из лучших игр последних несколько лет. Каждый должен пройти игру, или хотябы ознакомиться с ней. Игра равнодушным не оставит никого.

It's a fun game to just relax. If you can't get it 1/2 price, try to get someone to buy it for you. A little over-hyped but decent none the less.
Go into wall appear in other wall. 10/10

Probably the best game I have ever played, and I could play it over and over again. There is so much to discover, so much to work with, and at times a bit difficult. It's hilarious, thought provoking, and most of all, pure, unadultered fun. Portal 2 is a gem in the gaming industry, and if you haven't experienced Portal or Portal 2, you are seriously missing out on the best of the best.

This is an outstanding sequel to one of the most original "first person" games of all times. Valve's dark sense of humor is in fine form, continuing the saga of GLaDOS vs. you, and introducing brilliant new characters with spot-on voice characterizations: the absent-minded Wheatley, the increasingly insane Cave Johnson, and the test chamber Announcer. The addition of cooperative play takes the game to a completely different level. It's nice to join another player on an adventure that doesn't simply involve dispensing as much lead into as many bodies as possible.
Awesome. Incredible awesome.
~A must have for those who love puzzle and Valve titles!
The story of a ragtag group of iPods, fighting in the name of a rebellion to overthrow the evil Apple empress.
TOTALLY BAWSS
Whether on sale or not on sale, worth any amount of money they ask you. An amazing singleplayer story and tons of fun co-op maps to do with your friends, this is one you want in your games library.
Magnificent sequel with charismatic robots.

歴史的名作の続編に課された高いハードルもしっかりとクリアしてくる安心のValveクオリティ。シングルだけでもプレイする価値は十分ですが、COOPの面白さはもう一つのメインコンテンツと言えるほど。気の合うフレンドと、できればお互い初見で遊べる機会があるのならこのゲームの価値は何倍にもなります。

One of the most anticipated sequels in years. Portal 2 expands on the concepts from the first game and adds some new ones. That makes this a much larger and more challenging game. Personally I found it a bit overrated, but It's certainly a great game anyway.
